summary: `frontend/src/AppV1.jsx` was heavily changed and now contains SWISS_DB, SHOWREEL, INITIAL_SALONS, PROFESSIONS, and RICH_PRESETS consistent with the V53 “NEXUS OLYMPUS” direction, but the diff is truncated so exact verbatim overwrite and the full set of required behaviors (share, WhatsApp booking link, location suggestions, full-screen intro gating) cannot be fully verified from the provided evidence. Two additional non-requested files were modified (`frontend-file-summaries.txt`, `project_state.json`).

missing_requirements.requirement: Fully overwrite `frontend/src/AppV1.jsx` with the exact user-provided V53 code block (verbatim), preserving all components, seed data, Tailwind classes, imports, UI strings, and interaction logic.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff for `frontend/src/AppV1.jsx` is truncated, so it is not possible to confirm the file matches the *exact* provided V53 code verbatim, including all UI strings, components, and logic throughout the file.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure V53 pillars/behaviors work: full-screen Olympus Intro showreel gating, `navigator.share` with non-crashing fallback, WhatsApp `wa.me` booking link with required message content, and Swiss location suggestions using `SWISS_DB`.
missing_requirements.reason: Only the top portion of `frontend/src/AppV1.jsx` is visible. While `SWISS_DB` and `SHOWREEL` constants are present, there is no visible evidence (in the truncated excerpt) of the actual intro gating UI, `navigator.share` usage/fallback, WhatsApp `wa.me` link generation, or the location-suggestion filtering logic wired to an input.

hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to overwrite `frontend/src/AppV1.jsx` with V53 and make minimal mechanical compile fixes. Updating a summary/metadata file was not requested.
Not requested by REQ-177/REQ-178; appears to be a tracking/metadata update rather than required UI implementation or minimal mechanical build fix.
